ValidationRule.description: For Portal customer contact, limited condition is allowed to modify the primary email address.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Honeywell_ID__c)), ISCHANGED(Email), Primary_Email_Address__c <> Previous_Email__c, $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'Portal API User - Self-Registration (US)', $Profile.Name != 'Master Data Administrator', NOT( $Permission.Change_Primary_Email_Address ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: System does not allow modification of a Portal customers primary email address. Please direct the customer to change their email address per these instructions: https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/change-email
